metadata.title: A New Conjugate for the ELISA Quantitation of Porcine IgA

abstract.original_text: The preparation of a new soluble immune complex conjugate (anti-lgA-IgA-peroxidase), suitable for use in the ELISA technique is described. This conjugate requires pure lgA and specific anti-lgA, but the enzyme (peroxidase) was easily conjugated to the IgA.

sentences.segment_text: The preparation of a new soluble immune complex conjugate ( anti-lgA-IgA-peroxidase ) ,
suitable for use in the ELISA technique is described .
This conjugate requires pure lgA and specific anti-lgA ,
but the enzyme ( peroxidase ) was easily conjugated to the IgA .
